overview_of_class: Intermediate Russian 102-3 is the continuation of a two-year sequence that enables students to acquire intermediate-level proficiency. This course is designed for students who have successfully mastered the language skills in Elementary Russian. It proposes the further development and command of skills and abilities in the areas of reading, writing, listening, and speaking. Emphasis is also placed on vocabulary expansion, especially in the areas of speaking and writing. A great deal of attention will be devoted to the learning of grammar in conjunction with the immediate activation of it in conversation. Video materials and audiotapes will be used throughout the course.
name: Intermediate Russian
subject: SLAVIC
